column1: I'm actually glad to get back to episodes like this. The last arc didn't really resonate with me. It had some good drama to it
column2: but nothing is going to come close to the Kyoto arc. A few good filler episodes will be just fine by me.

column1: Selling toad oils.....Face paints.....IT'S JIRAIYA SENSEI !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

column2: Ryu Tsui Sen right off the bat! Guess Kenshin is taking the whole
column4: more loving" way of life to heart?
